name: Only One Friend(GMTK game jam)
description:
Only one friend is a little topdown shooter 2d in witch you are a little boy who fights his nighmares.

You'll must throw green fireballs to set friendly only one ennemie.

Keys :

W-Up

S-Down

A-Left

D-Right

you can also use the arrows

Left Click-Attack

Right Click - throw green fireball

Sorry for the english mistakes, I'm french.
